title: LF GOld ++ SUPPORT FOR rank 5s And DUO!!
body:
Hey guys im part of a team called legion gaming and we are seeking a solid support to join us who knows the game very well. we so far 2-0 but we haven't found the right active support yet, we are planning to enter cybergamer. we practice Monday Tuesday Thursday Friday and sometimes Saturday night. if you can shot call would be even better for the team. 

i am the adc of the team so i want someone who meshes well with me and can work together to get better and go far in the future. im pretty much on everyday.you must have a mic and team speak  and be gold ++

If you are interested then feel free leave a post about your current rank and ideas of what you can bring to the team or even add me in game eadweald thank you for your time hopefully we find the right person :)

replies.body:
Add you. 
S4: Gold V
S5: Silver II current

Main Sup & JG

Tank, aggressive 

available most of days from 9-11 pm Sydney time
